name: Hive and Honey
description:
Hive and Honey has the player control a hive of bees, growing and caring for the surrounding garden. Pollinate plants to create more while managing your hive and resources.

A game made for the Jamingtons 72 hour game jam.

Made by @NaomiWhetu  & @OneratDylan.

Major Update #1 (12-July-2018)

  • Better plant generation patterns.
  • Added plant limit that scales with screen.
  • Removed coliders on flowers.
  • Improved how to screen.
  • Weather system for rain, wind coming soon.
  • Flowers don't disappear from over poliatring, they instead go on a non collectable cooldown.
  • Increased starting nectar.

Coming Improvements:

  • Better Touch Controls.
  • In-game menu.
  • Save and load features.
  • Improved flower generation.
  • Limited flower count.
  • Weather system.
  • Added environmental objects.
  • Added mechanics.
  • General balancing.

Please let us know if there is any features are changes you think would benefit the game.
